short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily track your online subscriptions trials and set reminders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cancelly is an app to track your online purchases for fraudulent recurring subscriptions and track your trials

Our Chrome Extension is safe to use. It does not violate your privacy by asking for unnecessary permissions. Right click on Cancelly chrome extension icon to see what information it can read from your browser. Read our privacy policy here https://cancelly.ca/privacy.html

Why Google Chrome flags "This extension is not trusted by Enhanced Safe Browsing"?

"For new developers, it generally takes a few months to become trusted. Eventually, we strive for all developers with compliant extensions to reach this status upon meeting our Developer Programme Policies." Read more https://support.google.com/chrome_webstore/answer/2664769#zippy=%2Cinstall-with-enhanced-safe-browsing
